description:
The grassy fields of Big Cat Canyon are filled with dandelions.  When the wind blows, it creates a flurry of floating seeds.  
Can you transform Dot into a dandelion?

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn on all eye lights when tilted face up.

hints.description: Drag out an Eye Ring and turn on all of the eye lights. Link the states with a Face Up cue.

puzzles.description: After all of the eye lights are on, make Dot turn off some lights each time a voice is heard until all of the eye lights are turned off.

hints.description: Link the states with Voice Heard cues. Run the program and blow into Dot's microphone!

puzzles.description: After all of the eye lights are off, make Dot return to Start when tilted upright.

hints.description: Link the states with an Upright cue.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot pretend to be a dandelion. Hold Dot face up and blow into the microphone until all of the eye lights turn off.
puzzles.introduction: How many seeds can you sow when you blow?
